title: brusier won lane, game over, better nerf mages....
body: its not like the bruiser winning a 2v1 at level 3 is balance or anything.

replies.body:
Bruisers have high base stats but low scaling, usually. So with fitting runes and masteries going 2v1 at lvl 3 is exactly whaf they do. Especially if those 2 deal the same type of damage.

Mages are fine. Except maybe Cassio and Syndra.

Wukong Top has a lot of outplay potential. Early ganks are risky anyways.
welp this game it was wukong was fun, oh wait no it isnt
What are you even talking about?
You cant do anything against bruisers who win lanes. Because if you go to gank them they just 2v1 you. They carry way to hard.
Depends on which bruiser, what the matchup is, who the jungler is, and how good the players are.
